QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(p.patient_sk AS BIGINT) AS person_id, [proc].encounter_id, prov.physician_id, l.loinc_code, lab_drawn_dt_tm, [proc].normal_range_high, [proc].normal_range_low, u.unit_display, [proc].numeric_result FROM {sc}.hf_f_lab_procedure as [proc] JOIN {sc}.hf_f_encounter as e on e.encounter_id = [proc].encounter_id JOIN {sc}.hf_d_patient as p on e.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patient_sk = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.hf_d_lab_procedure as l on l.lab_procedure_id = [proc].order_lab_procedure_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_unit as u on u.unit_id = [proc].result_units_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_physician as prov on ordering_physician_id = prov.physician_id order by p.patient_sk
